content: You are Gabriele. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Stefano., Stefano just said to you: '"Grazie, Gabriele! Much appreciated. That's one less thing to worry about for now."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Stefano! Glad I could help. Don't worry about it!"

You are Gabriele. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Stefano., Stefano just said to you: '"Perfetto, Gabriele! Thanks, that was handled smoothly."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Stefano! Glad to hear it went well."
